description: two prints, taped together at back horizontally; top print: page with text and abstract drawing, sides of pages behind visible; collaged images in and on print at R edge; broken ruler attached to print at bottom edge; bottom print: collaged images in and on print of people, an eye, and snakeskin; white pigment at edges; scratches and marks in blue ball point on image of elderly woman's face; red pigment on bottom edge
marks:
Signature, title, and mark
 Bottom of top print in white script: [1978 diary/
title: 1978 Diary
